Description: Color value as number, array of 3 or 4 numbers, or a string in the format of either Hex value ("#0A0A0A0A") or named color "Blue". Array and Hex are ARGB. Alpha portion of ARGB may be ignored for some fields and can be omitted.
Name: Color

Description: Flags (ESM, NotPlayable, Deleted, InitiallyDisabled, Ignored, VisibleWhenDistant, Dangerous_OffLimits_InteriorCell, Compressed, CantWait)
Name: Fallout4MajorRecordFlags

Description: Memory slice in form of array of bytes
Name: TNAM
